info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:53PM EDT until June 01 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN MERCER COUNTY... At 553 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Grove City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Hermitage, Greenville, Stoneboro, Sandy Lake, Clark, Jamestown, Fredonia, Sheakleyville, and Maurice K Goddard State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
